title: RICHUAL marketing website + application-based membership form (frontend)

requirements.summary: Create required top-level marketing pages and persistent header navigation with distinct routes.
acceptanceCriteria: A persistent header navigation provides links to Home, About, Programs, Membership, Ritual Philosophy, and Apply.
Each navigation item routes to a distinct page view.
All pages render without runtime errors and are usable on mobile and desktop screen sizes.

file_operations.description: Create the app shell with a persistent header layout and route wiring for Home, About RICHUAL, Programs, Membership, Ritual Philosophy, Apply, plus an unlinked admin review route.

Create a persistent header navigation component with links to the required public pages (excluding admin). Use shadcn-ui primitives (e.g., Button) for consistent nav/CTA styling; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create the Home page view and export it for router integration.
Create the About RICHUAL page view and export it for router integration.
Create the Programs page view and export it for router integration.
Create the Membership page view and export it for router integration.
Create the Ritual Philosophy page view and export it for router integration.
Create the Apply page view with the application form and export it for router integration.
Ensure the app renders the newly created App component and global styles load correctly after adding/adjusting src-level styling imports.
Add a src-level CSS entry so the existing main.tsx import './index.css' resolves; keep this file as the single global styling entry point (may forward/import existing project CSS if needed).

requirements.summary: Apply a consistent dark luxury RICHUAL theme (matte black + metallic gold + deep saffron) with bold uppercase headings and premium minimal layout.
acceptanceCriteria: All pages share a consistent color palette (matte black background, gold accents, saffron highlights).
Headings are visually distinct, bold, and uppercase; body text is clean and readable with strong contrast.
The UI avoids playful/casual styling and maintains a minimal, premium look site-wide.

file_operations.description: Define/override global theme tokens and base typography to match matte black background, metallic gold primary accents, and deep saffron highlight accents; ensure high-contrast defaults site-wide.
Extend Tailwind theme tokens to include RICHUAL-specific brand colors (gold primary and saffron highlight) to be used consistently across pages/components.
Apply a global dark-mode class/structure (e.g., root wrapper) and consistent layout spacing/typography rules so all pages inherit the premium theme.

requirements.summary: Implement Home page hero + CTA to Apply and sections introducing the concept, four ranks, and Sanskrit discipline-code statements.
acceptanceCriteria: Home hero displays the headline "Enter the Order." prominently.
The "Apply for Membership" CTA is visible above the fold and navigates to the Apply page when clicked.
Home includes a section listing the four ranks: Initiate, Warrior, Titan, Inner Circle.
Home includes visible Sanskrit text: शक्ति, तपस्या, विकास.

file_operations.description: Build the Home hero with headline "Enter the Order.", an above-the-fold primary CTA routing to Apply, and sections for (a) concept framing (not a gym / initiation), (b) four ranks listing, and (c) discipline-code statements featuring Sanskrit text शक्ति, तपस्या, विकास. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Button/Card) for premium section structure; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Ensure the Home route is set as the default route and that the Apply route exists for the hero CTA navigation.

requirements.summary: Implement About RICHUAL page with disciplined philosophy framing (not a normal gym) and include Sanskrit phrases in copy.
acceptanceCriteria: About page clearly explains the RICHUAL philosophy and positions it as more than a gym.
About page includes the Sanskrit phrases शक्ति, तपस्या, and विकास rendered correctly.
Content tone is commanding and minimal (short impactful statements).

file_operations.description: Add commanding, minimal copy that explains the ritual/disciplined approach and explicitly positions RICHUAL as more than a gym; include Sanskrit phrases शक्ति, तपस्या, विकास in-line and ensure readable high-contrast typography.

requirements.summary: Implement Programs page with four rank sections/cards presented as hierarchical ranks with concise commanding descriptions.
acceptanceCriteria: Programs page displays exactly four rank entries: Initiate, Warrior, Titan, Inner Circle.
Each rank is styled consistently as a hierarchical rank (e.g., strong title treatment, premium card/section styling).
Each rank has a short description; language does not feel like casual sales copy.

file_operations.description: Implement exactly four rank entries (Initiate, Warrior, Titan, Inner Circle) with consistent premium styling and concise, commanding descriptions. Use shadcn-ui Card (or equivalent) to reinforce rank hierarchy presentation; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Implement Membership page emphasizing application-based entry, limited seats, premium positioning, and CTA to Apply.
acceptanceCriteria: Membership page explicitly states application-based entry and limited availability.
Membership page includes a clear CTA that navigates to the Apply page.
Page tone and styling match the RICHUAL elite/premium theme.

file_operations.description: Add content emphasizing application-based entry, limited seats, and premium/elite positioning with a clear CTA routing to the Apply page. Use shadcn-ui Button for the CTA treatment; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Ensure Apply route wiring supports CTA navigation from the Membership page.

requirements.summary: Implement Ritual Philosophy page with structured sections for daily rituals (morning discipline, physical training, meditation, wealth focus, brotherhood).
acceptanceCriteria: Ritual Philosophy page contains dedicated sections for morning discipline, physical training, meditation, wealth focus, and brotherhood.
The layout reads as a structured system (clear sectioning, consistent hierarchy).
Content tone aligns with sacred/ritual framing rather than casual fitness tips.

file_operations.description: Create a structured, sacred-feeling page layout with clearly separated sections for morning discipline, physical training, meditation, wealth focus, and brotherhood, using consistent hierarchy and minimal premium styling.

requirements.summary: Create Apply page form with required fields, submit button label, and client-side validation with clear English errors.
acceptanceCriteria: Apply page renders a form with inputs for Name, Age, Current fitness level, Income goal, and a longer text field for motivation.
Submit button label is exactly "Begin Your Transformation."
Form validates required fields on the client and shows clear inline or on-submit error messages in English.

file_operations.description: Implement the application form with required fields: Name, Age, Current fitness level, Income goal, and "Why do you want to join?" plus a submit button labeled exactly "Begin Your Transformation." Add client-side required validation and English error messages. Use shadcn-ui form inputs (Input/Textarea/Button) for consistent premium UI; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create centralized client-side validation helpers for the Apply form (required checks, numeric parsing for age, and readable English validation messages) to keep the Apply page component clean.

requirements.summary: Wire Apply submission to backend call with loading/disabled state, success confirmation, error handling, and duplicate-submit prevention.
acceptanceCriteria: Submitting the Apply form calls the backend and creates a stored application record.
While submitting, the submit button is disabled and a loading state is shown.
On success, the user sees a clear English confirmation message and the form resets or transitions to a confirmation view.
On failure, the user sees a clear English error message and can retry.

file_operations.description: Create a dedicated React hook that calls the backend submitApplication capability via useActor, manages loading/error/success states, and exposes a submit function to the Apply page.

Use the submit hook to call backend submitApplication, disable the submit button while submitting, show a clear loading state, and render a success confirmation state on success (and reset/transition). Show a clear English error message on failure and allow retry. Ensure the UI prevents duplicate submissions from the same interaction.

requirements.summary: Add an unlinked admin review page protected by Internet Identity login and admin-only access, listing applications most recent first.
acceptanceCriteria: Admin review page is not accessible from the public header navigation.
Viewing the admin review page requires Internet Identity login.
Only principals in an admin allowlist can view the applications list; non-admin authenticated users see an access denied message.
The admin page lists applications with at least: timestamp, name, age, fitness level, income goal, and motivation.

file_operations.description: Create an admin-only review page that prompts login when unauthenticated, checks admin status via backend isCallerAdmin, shows an access denied message for non-admins, and lists submitted applications (most recent first) using backend getApplications. Use shadcn-ui components for table/list layout where appropriate; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Implement a Login/Logout button using the existing useInternetIdentity hook and react-query cache clearing guidance from the authorization component; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create a react-query hook that (when authenticated and admin) fetches applications via backend getApplications and returns a most-recent-first sorted view for the admin page.
Register a non-public route (e.g., /admin/applications) for the admin review page, ensuring it is not included in the public header navigation.
Ensure the public header navigation does not include any link to the admin review route.

requirements.summary: Add generated static art assets (emblem + textures + hero background) and apply them across the site as readable high-contrast accents/backgrounds.
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are saved as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced directly by the frontend (not served via the backend).
At least one texture/background asset is visible on the Home hero and does not reduce text contrast below readable levels.
A simple emblem/mark is visible in the header and/or footer and matches the dark luxury theme.

file_operations.description: Add the generated static emblem asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/richual-emblem.dim_512x512.png for direct frontend referencing.
Add the generated static texture asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/smoke-embers-texture.dim_2048x2048.png for direct frontend referencing.
Add the generated static texture asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/temple-stone-texture.dim_2048x2048.png for direct frontend referencing.
Add the generated static hero background asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-gym-silhouette.dim_2400x1350.png for direct frontend referencing.
Reference frontend/public/assets/generated/richual-emblem.dim_512x512.png in the header as a visible emblem/mark while maintaining high contrast and premium spacing.

Apply at least one generated background/texture (e.g., frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-gym-silhouette.dim_2400x1350.png and/or frontend/public/assets/generated/smoke-embers-texture.dim_2048x2048.png) to the Home hero while preserving readability and contrast.

Add global utility classes (or base-layer styling) to support subtle background textures/overlays across sections without harming text contrast, ensuring assets remain accents rather than busy backgrounds.
